name: Lady Death Sketch Series 2 AE Card (purple)
description:
This is an original, one of a kind collectible, Lady Death Series 2 Artist Exclusive (AE) sketch card featuring Lady Death. 

The sketch card measures 2.5 x 3.5 and is done with Copic Markers and Micron pens.

Free standard shipping is included with order.

name: The Afterlife Chronicles of a Zombie Issue#1
description:
Series Description
When female artist Lark is suddenly thrust in to the rigmarole of life’s seemingly mundane chores, her imagination takes the hit and she begins to lose her ability to create the artwork she holds so dear. This sets in motion a chain of events that unite her with her freshly undead ally. Their friendship, bound by some mystical force, sends them on a journey through a world filled with creations birthed from the deepest recesses of the mind. Their goal: reignite Lark’s passion for creation or face the horrible consequences… 

Issue 1 Description
After inexplicably rising from the dead a year after his death, the mysterious zombie is united by fate with Lark, a female artist fallen on hard times. This meeting is no ordinary encounter however, as the pair will soon find out when they unwittingly embark on an epic odyssey through a mysterious world.

The Afterlife Chronicles of a Zombie is a © and TM of Michael Garcia and Andy Perez. All Rights Reserved.

name: Lonely In Black Trade Paperback
description:
134 pages of comic goth goodness

In short:
When angst ridden gothic misfit Wesley Fisher is forced to participate in extracurricular activities by the school counselor, a chain of events is set in motion that threatens to destroy his individuality. A colorful cast of characters including a mysterious cosmic pig, a convenience store clerk with a secret, and a time traveling monkey accompany Wes on his epic journey of self loathing and self discovery. Will he ultimately sacrifice his very soul for the dark queen of his murky desire, or be saved by the ray of sunshine that may not be as one sided as he thinks she is? This compendium collects the full four issues in the Lonely in Black saga as well as several short stories that saw limited printing elsewhere.

This purchase includes a limited edition original sketch card with choice of Lonely in Black character.

Lonely in Black: Letters From Darkness TM and © Michael Garcia and Andy Perez. All Rights Reserved.

name: BOOM!
description:
Escape to the land were music follows you and every thing is blue.

Artwork is printed on 13"x19" Epson Premium Matte Paper (Heavyweight, ultra-smooth, bright white with a matte finish) with Ultra Hi-Definition Claria® ink. It is shipped in a art tube. Actual size of artwork is 11"x17".

Watermark of flying boombox is not on printed final.

Artwork is a © of Andy Perez.
